column5: Lone Star is a rustic tiny house on a Christmas tree farm. Youâ€™ll love taking walks in the Christmas tree fields and drinking coffee on the porch overlooking the pond. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, bird watchers, writers, and visitors who don't want to stay in a hotel. We're just 23 miles from the Texas Medical Center. Puppy dogs are welcome here!
column8: Tiny House on the Christmas Tree Farm
